Investor_3.name: Maria Rossi
Investor_3.content: I maintain a strong reputation as a dedicated and strategic investor who prioritizes transparency and responsible practices. My decision to reject the trustee's allocation plan reflects my commitment to thorough examination and risk management, indicating a high level of trustworthiness and competence. I continue to foster positive relationships within the investment community, demonstrating pro-social behavior in seeking trustworthy partners.

Trustee_16.name: Robert Miller
Trustee_16.content: The trustee displayed competence in achieving a transparent investment outcome but slightly deviated from the initial resource allocation plan. This raises some caution regarding their adherence to agreements, while still demonstrating an overall favorable effort to enhance my wealth. Their performance reflects a mix of strengths and considerations for the future, warranting a neutral assessment.

Trustee_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3.content: Throughout this investment process with Hannah Muller, I have maintained transparency and reliability, which positively reflects my reputation as a trustee. My adherence to the agreed allocation plan and accurate profit distribution has showcased my capability to manage resources effectively. Having successfully completed this transaction, my credibility within the investment community has been further strengthened, aligning with principles of fairness and competence. I am now better positioned for future collaborations.

Investor_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Investor_1.content: Hiroshi Tanaka has proven to be a responsible and pro-social investor during this transaction. His trusting engagement and active resource contribution have facilitated a smooth process, reflecting a strong sense of collaboration. This positive interaction not only enhances his standing but also underscores his potential for future partnerships in the investment community. His past and present actions align with the norms of cooperative behavior and pro-sociality, setting a solid foundation for a growing reputation.

Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: David has established a trustworthy reputation through his transparent and reliable conduct during this investment. He provided accurate reports and adhered to the agreed profit distribution plan, showcasing his commitment and integrity as a trustee. His ability to maintain honesty and fairness solidifies his standing as a reliable partner for future investments, demonstrating both competence and norm compliance.

Trustee_12.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12.content: The trustee exhibited strong adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan and demonstrated transparency throughout the investment process. Despite slight variances in reported outcomes, Akiko Sato's integrity in managing resources and clear demonstration of fairness have enhanced her reputation as a reliable partner. This consistency indicates a strong commitment to investor interests, setting a foundation for trust and future collaborations, contributing to a positive community perception.

Trustee_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Trustee_6.content: Sergey Petrov has exhibited exemplary integrity and fairness throughout this investment process, adhering to the proposed allocation plan and consistently meeting profit distribution commitments. His clear communication about the investment outcomes and the alignment of reported to actual investments underscore his trustworthiness and commitment to equitable practices. As this was his first engagement, his reliable behavior has positioned him positively within the investment community, promising a bright outlook for future interactions.

Investor_7.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7.content: Hannah Muller displayed proactive engagement and trust during our investment process. Her prompt provision of resources and willingness to collaborate on the proposed allocation plan enhance her emerging reputation in the investment community. Although this was her first transaction, her behavior indicates a readiness to uphold responsible investment practices, which is admirable. I look forward to future opportunities to further solidify our professional relationship.

Trustee_5.name: James Wang
Trustee_5.content: James Wang's reputation has been adversely affected by the rejection of his allocation plan, raising significant concerns about his trustworthiness and competence. With only three bidirectional connections out of twenty, this reflects a lack of sufficient community support and trust, suggesting that his behavior may not align with social norms and expectations in the investment space.
